## FlagRunner

interface FlagRunner<E, R> {
    run(context: CustomEvaluationContext<E>): Promise<R>;
}

### run

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(context: <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/custom-evaluation-context#customevaluationcontext'>CustomEvaluationContext</a>&#60;E&#62;) => Promise&#60;R&#62;`}   />

This allows for more flexible evaluation based on custom logic or external data.
